title: Club Issue
body: So Clubs have been fixed, however since then, the club that I was in and am the owner of is not showing up at the bottom of the screen nor is my clan tag on my username. My friends who are also in the club say that I am still in the club, but it says that I am "Offline". Not sure what I should do about this, tell me what I can do to fix this please. Thanks.

replies.body:
We're investigating this issue, as it began after the clubs re-enable. I recommend reaching out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can work with you one-on-one about this.

Let me know if you have any questions.
Hi! I sent a support ticket yesterday, I haven't received a response for 24 hours, not sure if I should send another? I also noticed that it's not only my issue. Thank you!

Definitely don't send another, as it can actually increase the reply time or cause confusion. We've had a lot of tickets submitted recently as a result of this issue, so we'll have a specialist get back to you as soon as possible.

i have the same issue but is there a way I can just get kicked from the club by support
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
If you write a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) in, we can certainly see what we can do. ^.^
Hopefully they fix this soon. I've been having the same trouble.
Me too. My club named trigonometry and I'm the owner. Club is not displayed.
